name: JfrogCliV2
description: Run your own JFrog CLI command.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: jfrogPlatformConnection
inputs.label: JFrog Platform service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: JFrog Platform service connection to use in the command.

inputs.name: useCustomVersion
inputs.label: Use custom JFrog CLI version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to use a specific JFrog CLI version.

inputs.name: cliVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the version of JFrog CLI to use.
You can also set $(jfrogCliVersion).

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command to run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set your JFrog CLI command after 'jf '. There is no need to provide the URL, the credentials or the server ID options.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory where the command will run. When empty, the value of '$(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)' is used.
